[b] 4 out of 5. [/b]

It's a good game. I remember playing it back on the Xbox 360, but I never played multiplayer since I didn't know â€œXbox Liveâ€ (or â€œXbox Goldâ€) was a thing until 2018. 

I'm now playing it on PC, which is better. I recommend playing with friends if you have any. 

Watch out for trolls, especially the ones that teamkill. They're annoying, but you can shit on them if your aim is good. 

You can run this game at 1080p stable 60 frames with real players on an Intel UHD 620.

Even though it is laggy at times, it is a very fun game to play! I meant to buy l4d2 instead of this one, but it's still fun!
muy bueno el juego. me encanta.

I must say, for the first game in the franchise, (at least that i know of) this is a really good game, even if it hasn't aged the best (at least compared to most modern games now). This game has a decent variety of weapons, memorable characters, and can even be challenging at times. I've beaten the first 3 campaigns and they were definitely worth playing. I'd give this game a 9/10. It's not L4D2, but dang this is still a good game to play. I would definitely recommend playing it. :D

My boyfriend introduced this to me with his xbox 360, I had so much fun playing it then and still do. It's worth replaying - unless you replay it WAY too much and experience burn out - there are so many chances to get achievements, and is overall a fun shoot em up. L4d2, Back for Blood, and World War Z have been amazing to play with this in the back of my head as a sort of predecessor
